mil4.4:1.1: “Bhante nagasena, atthahi karanehi buddhi parinamati paripakam gacchati.
mil4.4:1.3: Vayaparinamena buddhi parinamati paripakam gacchati, yasaparinamena buddhi parinamati paripakam gacchati, paripucchaya buddhi parinamati paripakam gacchati, titthasamvasena buddhi parinamati paripakam gacchati, yoniso manasikarena buddhi parinamati paripakam gacchati, sakacchaya buddhi parinamati paripakam gacchati, snehupasevanena buddhi parinamati paripakam gacchati, patirupadesavasena buddhi parinamati paripakam gacchati.
